TopicTitle: How to install mods on linux?

Articles.Content: Running KSP on a new install of ubuntu. It's very smooth, looks great. Anyone know how to install mods using linux? I can't find anything using google about how to do it and I haven't a clue how to do it outside of Windows.

I don't know what mods you are running but you should just need to unzip the mod in your KSP directory the same as in Windows. I use linux and installed Kethane, KAS and Engineer without any problems.
